post.text: Debemos asegurar que Donald Trump nunca pueda implementar su intolerante plan migratorio: voyavotar2016.com

comment.author: Alec
comment.text: an unqualified & characterless man (Donald J. Trump)

replies.author: Raegan
replies.text: Says the foreigner that hates America.

replies.author: Alec
replies.text: Raegan The entire world admire American democracy and freedom, aspire to the high level of openness and prosperity of the united states .. How can you think of such a dirty, greedy, filthy rich Man to be the elected President of US, this is going to be the greatest mistake American people will do for 2016.. if he is elected for the oval office.

replies.author: James
replies.text: Hey, Monica, blo* job in oval office, rape, corrupted foundation, donations from Saudi Arabia who treats women worst than slaves, and finaly last nail on your campaign coffin. .. fbi reopened your case to send you to the big house
